## Source: ossf-package-analysis (019688659a99450327207afba1f1cf969ed32c941619143ab0d8698209833f89)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vscode-azurecontainerapps' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
